PSCT.Vegas:
① If you control a Beast-Warrior "Bujin" monster: 
You can banish this card from your GY, then target 1 Spell/Trap your opponent controls; 
destroy that target. 
(You can only use the effect of "Bujingi Centipede" once per turn).
